Class NebulaCloudAnimator

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.view.NebulaCloudAnimator
public class NebulaCloudAnimator extends Object
NebulaCloudAnimator creates and animates colorful nebula gas clouds. These clouds drift slowly across the screen with pulsing glow effects, creating a cosmic atmosphere.

      public javafx.scene.shape.Circle createNebulaCloud()

      Returns:
      a Circle representing a nebula cloud

    • animateCloud

      public void animateCloud(javafx.scene.shape.Circle cloud, javafx.scene.layout.Pane parentPane)
      Animates a nebula cloud with slow drifting and pulsing effect.
      Parameters:
      cloud - the cloud to animate
      parentPane - the pane containing the cloud

    • createAndAnimateCloud

      public javafx.scene.shape.Circle createAndAnimateCloud(javafx.scene.layout.Pane parentPane)
      Creates and animates a new nebula cloud.
      Parameters:
      parentPane - the pane to add the cloud to
      Returns:
      the created and animated cloud

    • fillWithClouds

      public void fillWithClouds(javafx.scene.layout.Pane parentPane, int cloudCount)
      Fills the screen with multiple nebula clouds.
      Parameters:
      parentPane - the pane to add clouds to
      cloudCount - the number of clouds to create
